article_title: Norman horse stable is a sister act

article_metadata.news_keywords: , oklahoma city, wisconsin, shappee, morgan horse, business, norman, mary shappee, majic stables
article_metadata.author:
Doris Wedge
For The Transcript

og.description: Majic Stables, a Norman business for 17 years and one of the largest Morgan horse barns in the state, is a sister act, with one sister managing the four-legged clients
